Name: If customer type is 'Entity' then get Business Name; if customer type is 'Individual' and Role is 'Applicant' then get First Name LastName from Borrower else get First Name LastName from CoApplicant.
Street: If role is 'Applicant' then get street from Borrower else from CoApplicant
City: If role is 'Applicant' then get City from Borrower else from CoApplicant
State: If role is 'Applicant' then get State from Borrower else from CoApplicant
ProjectCost: if loan product is '504' and Loan Type is 'Commercial' then take project cost from '504-C'; else if loan product is '504' and Loan Type is 'RealEstate' then take project cost from '504-R'; else if loan product is '7a' and Loan Type is 'Commercial' then take project cost from '7a-C'; else if loan product is '7a' and Loan Type is 'RealEstate' then take project cost from '7a-R'
DownPayment: if loan product is '504' and Loan Type is 'Commercial' then take DownPayment from '504-C'; else if loan product is '504' and Loan Type is 'RealEstate' then take DownPayment from '504-R'; else if loan product is '7a' and Loan Type is 'Commercial' then take DownPayment from '7a-C'; else if loan product is '7a' and Loan Type is 'RealEstate' then take DownPayment from '7a-R'
LoanAmount: if loan product is '504' and Loan Type is 'Commercial' then take LoanAmount from '504-C'; else if loan product is '504' and Loan Type is 'RealEstate' then take LoanAmount from '504-R'; else if loan product is '7a' and Loan Type is 'Commercial' then take LoanAmount from '7a-C'; else if loan product is '7a' and Loan Type is 'RealEstate' then take LoanAmount from '7a-R'
